title: Wake Up Boo

(D) I don’t (C)mind (I don’t mind)

(Bb) I (C)shouldn’t be (Am)up at this time
(Bb) But (C)I can’t (D)sleep with you there by my side
 
(Bb) Wake (C)up it’s a (Am)beautiful morning (wake up)
(Bb) Feel the (C)sun shining (Am)for your eyes
(Bb) Wake (C)up it’s so (Am)beautiful (wake up Boo)
(Bb) For what could (C)be the (D)very last time
 
(D) Twenty(C)five (twenty-five)
(Bm)Don’t recall a time I felt (G)this alive (this alive)
(D) So wake up (C)Boo (wake up Boo)
(Bm)There’s so many things for (E)us to do (things for us to do)
 
(Bb) It’s (C)early so (Am)take your time
(Bb) Don’t let me (C)rush you (Am)please
